meanings.sent1: She kept redemanding her favorite book from her friend.
meanings.sent2: The teacher redemanded the homework assignment after it was lost.
meanings.sent3: The cat redemanded to be let outside, even though it had just come in.
meanings.sent4: The toddler redemanded attention from his parents by throwing a tantrum.
meanings.sent5: The customer redemanded a refund after receiving a faulty product.

meanings.definition: Requesting or requiring something to be returned or done again.
meanings.sent1: He redemanded the package that was mistakenly delivered to his neighbor.
meanings.sent2: The manager redemanded a meeting to discuss the project timeline.
meanings.sent3: The student redemanded a retest after failing the first one.
meanings.sent4: The athlete redemanded a rematch after a controversial loss.
meanings.sent5: The customer redemanded better service after a disappointing experience.
